messages.subject: Waldorf high schools
messages.msgSnippet: My daughter attended a Waldorf school K-2nd grade and home/unschooled ever since. She s now 17 and if she were in school, this fall would be the beginning of
messages.messageBody:
My daughter attended a Waldorf school K-2nd grade and home/unschooled ever since. She's now 17 and if she were in school, this fall would be the beginning of her senior year.

She's been talking a lot lately about going back to school this last year, partially because she'd like to experience it before it's too late and partially because the idea of a ready-made group seems nice to her.

Have any of you had experience with a Waldorf high school? How about kids going back to school for just one, last year? I see both positive and negative aspects to it.

We have to act quickly on this because she's just been accepted to the Not Back to School Camp and we have to let them know right away if she's going or not. I hate to have her miss this experience, but I'm trying to be sensitive to her needs.

Susan
